headline: UDT SINGLE- CHANNEL OPTOMETER/265 SENSOR
categories.lvl1: Optical / Photonic Equipment > Other Optical / Photonic Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer UTD
Model S370
Description Single-Channel Optometer/265 Sensor
Accessories

UTD Model 265 Sensor with rubber light shield
Standard calibrations: nit (cd/m2); footlamberts
Photometric filter accuracy: <1.0%
CIE V Function: < f1' +/- 3%
Sensor active area(cm2): 0.34
Dynamic range: 1.0E-03 - 1.0E+05 cd/m2
Typical response: 1.1E-09 A/cd/m2 @ 0 nm
Features: high accuracy photometric filter(f'1 <3%)

Other Information

Calibration responsibility of purchaser

Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.250 in (21.0 cm)
Depth 9.250 in (23.5 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 4 lb (2 kg)
